explains: adj. 具有企业家素质的，富于企业家精神的
wordGroup: entrepreneurial management 创业管理；企业家管理

sentences.en: In its early years the organization operated in an unconventional manner that characterized its innovative and entrepreneurial approach to the industry.
sentences.cn: 在-早期，该组织以非常规的方式运作，其特点是对该行业的创新和创业方法。

sentences.en: His company, Soria Natural SA, has become an entrepreneurial success story.
sentences.cn: 他的公司Soria Natural SA，已经成为企业成功的一个案例。

sentences.en: He was eager to return to a more entrepreneurial role in which he had a big financial stake in his own efforts.
sentences.cn: 他渴望回到更具企业家性质的角色，这样他的努力就跟自己有大的金融利害关系。
